<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs=""
>
[Harrow Ritualist](/Feats.aspx?ID=4158) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Stolen Fate Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=197) pg. 14</row>

**Archetype** [Harrower](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=204)

**Access**
This feat is available to all players in a Stolen Fate campaign

</column>

---

You immediately learn two of the following rituals: [_astral projection_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=29), [_call spirit_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=5), [_commune_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=6), [_commune with nature_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=7), [_legend lore_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=15), or [_planar binding_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=17). When you perform any ritual, you can incorporate harrow cards into the ritual to gain a +2 status bonus to all skill checks made to resolve the effects of the ritual. You can take this feat more than once; each time you do, you learn two new rituals.
